pageContext.claim: “Think of what the Democrats and their deep state allies have been caught doing. They spied on my campaign.”
pageContext.analysis: The Justice Department inspector general's report does not state that the FBI spied on Trump's campaign. A secret surveillance warrant was obtained on Trump foreign policy adviser Carter Page, who had left the campaign by the time the FISA application was approved. The warrant was renewed three times. The inspector general found numerous errors in the warrant application but no bias in the FBI's decision-making.
